contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=February 2007}} {{West Bank}} The '''Qalqilya Governorate''' ({{Lang-ar|<big>محافظة قلقيلية</big>}} ''{{transl|ar|DIN|Muḥāfaẓat Qalqīliya}}'') is an administrative area of the [[Palestinian National Authority]] in the northwestern [[West Bank]]. Its capital or ''muhfaza'' (seat) is the city of [[Qalqilya]] that borders the [[Green Line (Israel)|Green Line]]. ==Localities== [[File:Qalqilya in Palestine.svg|thumb|]] ===Municipalities=== * [[Azzun]] * [[Hableh]] * [[Qalqilya]] * [[Kafr Thulth]] ===Towns and villages=== * [[Azzun Atma|Azzun 'Atma]] * [[Baqah]] * [[Baqat al-Hatab]] * [[Beit Amin]] * [[Falamya]] * [[Hajjah, Palestine|Hajjah]] * [[Immatain]] * [[Islah, Qalqilya|Islah]] * [[Jayyous]] * [[Jinsafut]] * [[Jit, Qalqilya|Jit]] * [[Kafr Laqif]] * [[Kafr Qaddum]] * [[Nabi Ilyas|an Nabi Elyas]] * [[Ras Atiya]] * [[Sanniriya]] * [[Fara'ata]] * [[Salman ]] {{Governorates of Palestine}} {{Coord|32|11|9|N|35|3|57|E|display=title|type:adm1st_region:IL}} [[Category:Qalqilya Governorate|*]] [[Category:Geography of the West Bank]]
